And I enter the booking time from "22 May, 2025" at "8:30 AM" to "24 May, 2025" at "9:30 AM" # stepDefinitions.RoyalBrothersSteps.i_enter_the_booking_time(java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String) And I click on search # stepDefinitions.RoyalBrothersSteps.i_click_on_search() Then I should see the correct booking filter applied for pickup "22 May, 2025" at "8:30 AM" and dropoff "24 May, 2025" at "9:30 AM" # stepDefinitions.RoyalBrothersSteps.i_should_see_the_correct_booking_filter_applied(java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String) When I apply the location filter "Koramangala" # stepDefinitions.RoyalBrothersSteps.i_apply_the_location_filter(java.lang.String) Then I should only see bikes available at "Koramangala" # stepDefinitions.RoyalBrothersSteps.i_should_only_see_bikes_available_at(java.lang.String) Then I print all available bike models and locations # stepDefinitions.RoyalBrothersSteps.i_print_all_available_bike_models_and_locations()
